name: Nasi Lemak
steps: Cook rice with coconut milk and pandan leaves
Fry anchovies and peanuts until crispy
Boil egg and slice cucumber
Serve with sambal and side ingredients

name: Steak
steps: Season steak with salt and pepper
Sear in a hot pan with butter, garlic, and rosemary
Rest before slicing
Serve with sides

name: Nasi Kerabu
ingredients: Blue pea flower rice (or regular rice)
Kerabu salad (herbs, bean sprouts, long beans)
Budu (fermented fish sauce) or salted fish sauce
steps: Cook blue pea flower rice (soak rice with butterfly pea flower water for color)
Prepare kerabu salad by mixing herbs, sprouts, and long beans with lime dressing
Grill or fry fish until cooked
Toast grated coconut with spices for serunding
Arrange all components on a plate with budu sauce and crackers
Serve with hard-boiled egg and optional turmeric sauce

name: Spaghetti Aglio Olio

Saut√© garlic in olive oil until golden (avoid burning)
Add chili flakes for heat
Toss cooked spaghetti into the garlic oil, adding pasta water if needed
Season with salt, pepper, and chopped parsley
Serve with grated parmesan (optional)
